name: Santiago Castro Zuluaga
profileDescription: I am a passionate and creative Systems Engineering student currently in my sixth semester. I excel in teamwork and am known for my flexibility and eagerness to learn new technologies and methodologies. My programming experience has enabled me to develop innovative and efficient solutions, and I am always looking for opportunities to improve and expand my knowledge. I am committed to continuous growth and excellence in my field. Additionally, I have a strong affinity for data management and a quick learning ability in any environment.
job1Description: Development of a complete website, organization of processes, accounting management and database maintenance.
job2Description: Member of the logistics division with database and resource management.
